attributes.action: Stop public funding of policing for the orange walks
attributes.background: The Orange Order walks are still allowed to disrupt travel, are policed by public funds & create a noise disruption. We would like to see this practice banned - or at the very least they should be paying for their own policing.

rejection.details:
Policing in Northern Ireland is a devolved responsibility.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
